thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Check out full list of winners [Live Updates]

author: Chidumga Izuzu
title: Oscars 2017: Check out full list of winners [Live Updates]
text: Tweet It's almost time for The Academy Awards, Hollywood's biggest night. Pulse Movies will be bringing you live updates of the winners. Jimmy Kimmel is set to host the evening's event for the first time. The musical "La La Land" leads with 14 nominations, while "Arrival " ties in second place with "Moonlight" with eight nominations. Other nominees include "Lion" and "Manchester By the Sea" with six Oscar nominations each. Check out full list of winners below as they are announced. Best Picture
